creditline: Gift of Richard, Jacquelyn, and Nicole Campbell in memory of Jack W. Nichols
description: head and torso of a woman with her head turned to PL; woman wears lace-collared dress and dark shawl; woman has dark hair
inscription:
Signature, date, inscription, stamp

LRC, in the plate: [G. 42-11 (backwards)]; in margins on front and on back, in pencil: various notations
markings: LRC on back, stamped: [H.M.P. (inside an oval)]
title: Mme. Montigny
